## Requirements

```{r eval=FALSE}
vec_pkg <- c("devtools", "usethis", "roxygen2", "pkgdown")
vec_inst <- vec_pkg[!is.element(vec_pkg, installed.packages())]
if (length(vec_inst) > 0) install.packages(vec_inst, dependencies = TRUE)
```
